document_data.name: Unquestioning Obedience
document_data.mainbody: '''''Unquestioning obedience''''' was a [[Divine magic|divine]] [[enchantment]] [[spell]] used by specialty priests devoted to [[Siamorphe]] called [[Highborn]]s, enabling them to command others with a phrase.
document_data.Effects:
This spell allowed the priest to command complete obedience by uttering a simple phrase as long as the target understood the priest's language. The target would obey concise commands as best as they could. Any command that would cause immediate harm to or kill the target would cause the spell to end.

A single command could be given to the target per casting of this spell.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[verbal component]]s to cast.
